title: About 15-20% of my games at Diamond V have a leaver. Can something please be done to mitigate this?
body:
i.e. reduced MMR losses for the team with the leaver, since this isn't a zero sum game.

It's getting kind of ridiculous.

replies.body:
Don't play Solo Que, unless you can carry every game.
Facts.

The problem with messing with LP is it opens a whole can of worms for exploitation, accusation and general stupidity.

The positive side is both sides get the leavers equally. The only fix is preventing leavers in the first place instead of trying to do damage control.
